name: breach
description: Security vulnerability hunting toolkit. Nine-skill pipeline with autonomous looping discovery for expert bug hunters: source code reconnaissance with threat modeling and git history analysis, custom Semgrep/CodeQL rule generation tailored to the target codebase, automated static scanning (Semgrep + CodeQL), autonomous looping code analysis with coverage tracking and auto-shift on diminishing returns, canonical finding structure and PoC standards, finding validation with anti-hallucination gates, production config verification, and anti-speculation checks, vulnerability chain discovery, human-verified reporting with AI quality gates (anti-verbosity, PoC validation, platform compliance), and pipeline orchestration.
